file.title: AMM PART II-1285 - CHAPTER 21-23-04-04 - CONFIG-2 - GASPER SYSTEM MUFFLERS - REMOVAL/INSTALLATION

page.data: AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL GASPER SYSTEM MUFFLERS - REMOVAL/INSTALLATION EFFECTIVITY: ACFT MODEL(S) EMB-135 1. General A. This section gives the procedures to remove and install the gasper system mufflers. B. The gasper system mufflers are installed in the inlet and outlet of the gasper fan, under the passenger cabin floor. C. The procedures in this section are given in the sequence below. The tasks identified with ( ♦) are part of the Scheduled Maintenance Requirements Document (SMRD). TASK NUMBER DESCRIPTION EFFECTIVITY ACFT MODEL(S) GASPER SYSTEM MUFFLERS - REMOV- 21-23-04-000-802-A EMB-135 AL ACFT MODEL(S) GASPER SYSTEM MUFFLERS - INSTAL- 21-23-04-400-802-A EMB-135 LATION EMB-145 - AMM 1285 General CONFIG-2 21-23-04 Page 1 of 8 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL TASK 21-23-04-000-802-A EFFECTIVITY: ACFT MODEL(S) EMB-135 2. GASPER SYSTEM MUFFLERS - REMOVAL A. General (1) This task gives the procedures to remove the gasper system mufflers. B. References REFERENCE DESIGNATION AMM MPP 06-41-02/100 - AMM TASK 53-01-02-000-802-A/400 - C. Zones and Accesses ZONE PANEL/DOOR LOCATION 251 251HF Passenger cabin floor 252 252DF Passenger cabin floor D. Tools and Equipment Not Applicable E. Auxiliary Items Not Applicable F. Consumable Materials Not Applicable G. Expandable Parts Not Applicable H. Persons Recommended QTY FUNCTION PLACE 1 Does the task Under the passenger cabin floor I. Preparation SUBTASK 841-010-A (1) Remove the floor access panels (AMM MPP 06-41-02/100 and AMM TASK 53-01-02-000-802-A/400), as applicable: – 251HF and 252DF (Inlet mufflers). – 251HF (Outlet muffler). (2) Loosen the velcro fastener of the insulation blankets of the gasper fan, if applicable. EMB-145 - AMM 1285 000-802-A/400 CONFIG-2 21-23-04 Page 2 of 8 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL J. Removal of the Gasper System Mufflers (Figure 401) SUBTASK 020-010-A (1) Remove the first inlet muffler (Figure 401, Sheet 1) as follows: (a) Remove the tiedown straps (1). (b) Loosen the clamp (2). (c) Remove the first inlet muffler (3). (2) Remove the second inlet muffler (Figure 401, Sheet 2) as follows: (a) Remove the tiedown strap (1). (b) Loosen the clamps (2). (c) Remove the insulating blanket (4). (d) Remove the second inlet muffler (3). (3) Remove the outlet muffler (Figure 401, Sheet 3) as follows: (a) Remove the tiedown straps (2). (b) Loosen the clamps (1). (c) Remove the outlet muffler (3). EMB-145 - AMM 1285 000-802-A/400 CONFIG-2 21-23-04 Page 3 of 8 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

TIEDOWN STRAP SCREEN (REF.) 2. CLAMP DET. B 3. FIRST INLET MUFFLER EM145AMM211251A.DGN EMB-145 - AMM 1285 000-802-A/400 CONFIG-2 21-23-04 Page 4 of 8 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL EFFECTIVITY: ACFT MODEL(S) EMB-135 Gasper System Mufflers - Removal/Installation Figure 401 - Sheet 2 A ZONES 161 162 DET. A B 2. CLAMP 1. TIEDOWN STRAP SLEEVE (REF.) 4. INSULATING BLANKET 3. SECOND INLET MUFFLER 2. CLAMP DET. B GASPER FAN (REF.) EM145AMM211250A.DGN EMB-145 - AMM 1285 000-802-A/400 CONFIG-2 21-23-04 Page 5 of 8 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL EFFECTIVITY: ACFT MODEL(S) EMB-135 Gasper System Mufflers - Removal/Installation Figure 401 - Sheet 3 A ZONES 161 DET. A 162 B 1 1. CLAMP 2. TIEDOWN STRAP 2. TIEDOWN STRAP 3. OUTLET MUFFLER 1. CLAMP GASPER FAN 1 (REF.) 1 EM145AMM211249A.DGN APPLY TIGHTENING TORQUE OF 5.6 - 6.8 N.m (50 -60 lb.in). EMB-145 - AMM 1285 000-802-A/400 CONFIG-2 21-23-04 Page 6 of 8 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL TASK 21-23-04-400-802-A EFFECTIVITY: ACFT MODEL(S) EMB-135 3. GASPER SYSTEM MUFFLERS - INSTALLATION A. General (1) This task gives the procedures to install the gasper system mufflers. B. References REFERENCE DESIGNATION AMM MPP 06-41-02/100 - AMM TASK 53-01-02-400-802-A/400 - IPC 21-23-00 GASPER C. Zones and Accesses ZONE PANEL/DOOR LOCATION 251 251HF Passenger cabin floor 252 252DF Passenger cabin floor D. Tools and Equipment Not Applicable E. Auxiliary Items Not Applicable F. Consumable Materials SPECIFICATION DESCRIPTION QTY (BRAND) KB 42/75 - 75 mm (2.95 in) Adhesive Tape AR G. Expendable Parts IPC REFERENCE ITEM QTY (VENDOR REFERENCE) Tiedown strap IPC 21-23-00 7 H. Persons Recommended QTY FUNCTION PLACE 1 Does the task Under the passenger cabin floor I. Installation of the Gasper System Mufflers (Figure 401) SUBTASK 420-010-A (1) Install the first inlet muffler (Figure 401, Sheet 1) as follows: (a) Put the first inlet muffler (3) in the installation position. EMB-145 - AMM 1285 400-802-A/400 CONFIG-2 21-23-04 Page 7 of 8 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL (b) Install the clamp (2). (c) Install the tiedown straps (1). (2) Install the second inlet muffler (Figure 401, Sheet 2) as follows: (a) Put the second inlet muffler (3) in the installation position. (b) Install the clamps (2). (c) Install the tiedown strap (1). (d) Install the insulating blanket (4). (3) Install the outlet muffler (Figure 401, Sheet 3) as follows: (a) Put the outlet muffler (3) in the installation position. (b) Install the clamps (1). (c) Install the tiedown straps (2). J. Follow-on SUBTASK 842-010-A (1) Attach the velcro fastener of the insulation blankets of the gasper fan, if applicable. (2) Install the floor access panels (AMM MPP 06-41-02/100 and AMM TASK 53-01-02-400-802-A/400), as applicable: – 251HF and 252DF (Inlet mufflers). – 251HF (Outlet muffler). EMB-145 - AMM 1285 400-802-A/400 CONFIG-2 21-23-04 Page 8 of 8 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.
